---------- Input ----------
select * exclude c1, b.* exclude (c2, c3, c4) from customer inner join orders on a = b limit 1
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * EXCLUDE (c1), b.* EXCLUDE (c2, c3, c4) FROM customer INNER JOIN orders ON (a = b) LIMIT 1
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..86,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..86,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: Some(
                        [
                            Name(
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "c1",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        17..19,
                                    ),
                                },
                            ),
                        ],
                    ),
                },
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Identifier(
                            Identifier {
                                name: "b",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    21..22,
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                23..24,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: Some(
                        [
                            Name(
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "c2",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        34..36,
                                    ),
                                },
                            ),
                            Name(
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "c3",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        38..40,
                                    ),
                                },
                            ),
                            Name(
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "c4",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        42..44,
                                    ),
                                },
                            ),
                        ],
                    ),
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        60..70,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: Inner,
                        condition: On(
                            BinaryOp {
                                span: Some(
                                    83..84,
                                ),
                                op: Eq,
                                left: ColumnRef {
                                    span: Some(
                                        81..82,
                                    ),
                                    database: None,
                                    table: None,
                                    column: Name(
                                        Identifier {
                                            name: "a",
                                            quote: None,
                                            span: Some(
                                                81..82,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                    ),
                                },
                                right: ColumnRef {
                                    span: Some(
                                        85..86,
                                    ),
                                    database: None,
                                    table: None,
                                    column: Name(
                                        Identifier {
                                            name: "b",
                                            quote: None,
                                            span: Some(
                                                85..86,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                    ),
                                },
                            },
                        ),
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                51..59,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,

                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    51..59,

                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,

    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,

---------- Input ----------
select * from customer inner join orders
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM customer INNER JOIN orders
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..40,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..40,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..33,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: Inner,
                        condition: None,
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..22,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..22,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                34..40,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,

                                name: "orders",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    34..40,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],

}


---------- Input ----------
select * from customer cross join orders
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM customer CROSS JOIN orders
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..40,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..40,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..33,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: CrossJoin,
                        condition: None,
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..22,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..22,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                34..40,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "orders",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    34..40,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}

    span: Some(
        0..51,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..51,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..33,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: Inner,
                        condition: On(
                            BinaryOp {
                                span: Some(
                                    47..48,
                                ),
                                op: Eq,

                                    span: Some(
                                        45..46,

---------- Input ----------

---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..49,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..49,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..33,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: Inner,
                        condition: On(
                            BinaryOp {
                                span: Some(
                                    46..47,
                                ),
                                op: Eq,
                                left: ColumnRef {
                                    span: Some(
                                        44..45,
                                    ),
                                    database: None,
                                    table: None,
                                    column: Name(
                                        Identifier {
                                            name: "a",
                                            quote: None,
                                            span: Some(
                                                44..45,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                    ),
                                },
                                right: ColumnRef {
                                    span: Some(
                                        48..49,
                                    ),
                                    database: None,
                                    table: None,
                                    column: Name(
                                        Identifier {
                                            name: "b",
                                            quote: None,
                                            span: Some(
                                                48..49,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                    ),
                                },
                            },
                        ),
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..22,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..22,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                34..40,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "orders",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    34..40,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),

            span: Some(
                65..66,
            ),
            lit: UInt64(
                3,
            ),
        },
    ),
    ignore_result: false,
}


---------- Input ----------
select * from customer natural full join orders
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM customer NATURAL FULL OUTER JOIN orders
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..47,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..47,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        23..40,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: FullOuter,
                        condition: Natural,
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..22,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "customer",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..22,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                41..47,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "orders",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    41..47,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}


---------- Input ----------
select * from customer natural join orders left outer join detail using (id)
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM customer NATURAL INNER JOIN orders LEFT OUTER JOIN detail USING(id)
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..76,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..76,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        43..58,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: LeftOuter,
                        condition: Using(
                            [
                                Identifier {
                                    name: "id",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        73..75,
                                    ),
                                },
                            ],
                        ),
                        left: Join {
                            span: Some(
                                23..35,
                            ),
                            join: Join {
                                op: Inner,
                                condition: Natural,
                                left: Table {
                                    span: Some(
                                        14..22,
                                    ),
                                    catalog: None,
                                    database: None,
                                    table: Identifier {
                                        name: "customer",
                                        quote: None,
                                        span: Some(
                                            14..22,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                    alias: None,
                                    travel_point: None,
                                    pivot: None,
                                    unpivot: None,
                                },
                                right: Table {
                                    span: Some(
                                        36..42,
                                    ),
                                    catalog: None,
                                    database: None,
                                    table: Identifier {
                                        name: "orders",
                                        quote: None,
                                        span: Some(
                                            36..42,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                    alias: None,
                                    travel_point: None,
                                    pivot: None,
                                    unpivot: None,
                                },
                            },
                        },
                        right: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                59..65,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "detail",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    59..65,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}


---------- Input ----------
with t2(tt) as (select a from t) select t2.tt from t2  where t2.tt > 1
---------- Output ---------
WITH t2(tt) AS (SELECT a FROM t) SELECT t2.tt FROM t2 WHERE (t2.tt > 1)
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        33..70,
    ),
    with: Some(
        With {
            span: Some(
                0..32,
            ),
            recursive: false,
            ctes: [
                CTE {
                    span: Some(
                        5..32,
                    ),
                    alias: TableAlias {
                        name: Identifier {
                            name: "t2",
                            quote: None,
                            span: Some(
                                5..7,
                            ),
                        },
                        columns: [
                            Identifier {
                                name: "tt",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    8..10,
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                    },
                    materialized: false,
                    query: Query {
                        span: Some(
                            16..31,
                        ),
                        with: None,
                        body: Select(
                            SelectStmt {
                                span: Some(
                                    16..31,
                                ),
                                hints: None,
                                distinct: false,
                                select_list: [
                                    AliasedExpr {
                                        expr: ColumnRef {
                                            span: Some(
                                                23..24,
                                            ),
                                            database: None,
                                            table: None,
                                            column: Name(
                                                Identifier {
                                                    name: "a",
                                                    quote: None,
                                                    span: Some(
                                                        23..24,
                                                    ),
                                                },
                                            ),
                                        },
                                        alias: None,
                                    },
                                ],
                                from: [
                                    Table {
                                        span: Some(
                                            30..31,
                                        ),
                                        catalog: None,
                                        database: None,
                                        table: Identifier {
                                            name: "t",
                                            quote: None,
                                            span: Some(
                                                30..31,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                        alias: None,
                                        travel_point: None,
                                        pivot: None,
                                        unpivot: None,
                                    },
                                ],
                                selection: None,
                                group_by: None,
                                having: None,
                                window_list: None,
                            },
                        ),
                        order_by: [],
                        limit: [],
                        offset: None,
                        ignore_result: false,
                    },
                },
            ],
        },
    ),
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                33..70,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                AliasedExpr {
                    expr: ColumnRef {
                        span: Some(
                            40..45,
                        ),
                        database: None,
                        table: Some(
                            Identifier {
                                name: "t2",

                                name: "tt",

                            51..53,

                    },

                    travel_point: None,
                    pivot: None,
                    unpivot: None,

                BinaryOp {
                    span: Some(
                        67..68,

                    op: Gt,
                    left: ColumnRef {
                        span: Some(
                            61..66,
                        ),
                        database: None,
                        table: Some(
                            Identifier {
                                name: "t2",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    61..63,
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                        column: Name(
                            Identifier {
                                name: "tt",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    64..66,
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                    right: Literal {
                        span: Some(
                            69..70,
                        ),
                        lit: UInt64(
                            1,
                        ),
                    },
                },
            ),
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}

---------- Input ----------
with t2(tt) as materialized (select a from t), t3 as materialized (select * from t), t4 as (select a from t where a > 1) select t2.tt, t3.a, t4.a from t2, t3, t4 where t2.tt > 1
---------- Output ---------

---------- Input ----------
with recursive t2(tt) as (select a from t1 union select tt from t2) select t2.tt from t2
---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------

    span: Some(
        68..88,
    ),
    with: Some(
        With {
            span: Some(
                0..67,
            ),
            recursive: true,
            ctes: [
                CTE {
                    span: Some(
                        15..67,

                        name: Identifier {
                            name: "t2",
                            quote: None,

                                15..17,
                            ),

                            Identifier {
                                name: "tt",
                                quote: None,

                                    18..20,
                                ),
                            },

                        span: Some(
                            43..48,
                        ),

                                span: Some(
                                    43..48,

---------- Input ----------
with t(a,b) as (values(1,1),(2,null),(null,5)) select t.a, t.b from t
---------- Output ---------
WITH t(a, b) AS (VALUES(1, 1), (2, NULL), (NULL, 5)) SELECT t.a, t.b FROM t
---------- AST ------------

    span: Some(
        47..69,
    ),

            span: Some(

                    span: Some(
                        5..46,

---------- Input ----------
select c_count cc, count(*) as custdist, sum(c_acctbal) as totacctbal
            from customer, orders ODS,
                (
                    select
                        c_custkey,
                        count(o_orderkey)
                    from
                        customer left outer join orders on
                            c_custkey = o_custkey
                            and o_comment not like '%:1%:2%'
                    group by
                        c_custkey
                ) as c_orders
            group by c_count
            order by custdist desc nulls first, c_count asc, totacctbal nulls last
            limit 10, totacctbal
---------- Output ---------
SELECT c_count AS cc, COUNT(*) AS custdist, sum(c_acctbal) AS totacctbal FROM customer, orders AS ODS, (SELECT c_custkey, count(o_orderkey) FROM customer LEFT OUTER JOIN orders ON ((c_custkey = o_custkey) AND (o_comment NOT LIKE '%:1%:2%')) GROUP BY c_custkey) AS c_orders GROUP BY c_count ORDER BY custdist DESC NULLS FIRST, c_count ASC, totacctbal NULLS LAST LIMIT 10, totacctbal
---------- AST ------------

    span: Some(
        0..547,
    ),

---------- Input ----------

---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        17..23,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                17..23,
            ),
            op: Except,
            all: false,
            left: Select(
                SelectStmt {
                    span: Some(
                        0..16,
                    ),
                    hints: None,
                    distinct: false,
                    select_list: [
                        QualifiedName {
                            qualified: [
                                Star(
                                    Some(
                                        7..8,
                                    ),
                                ),
                            ],
                            exclude: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    from: [
                        Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..16,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "t1",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..16,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },

                    selection: None,
                    group_by: None,
                    having: None,
                    window_list: None,
                },
            ),

                    span: Some(
                        24..40,

        40..45,
    ),

            span: Some(

                                0..16,
                            ),

---------- Input ----------
select * from t1 union select * from t2 union all select * from t3
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM t1 UNION SELECT * FROM t2 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM t3
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        40..49,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                40..49,
            ),
            op: Union,
            all: true,

                SetOperation {
                    span: Some(
                        17..22,

                        SelectStmt {
                            span: Some(
                                0..16,

---------- Input ----------
select * from t1 union select * from t2 intersect select * from t3
---------- Output ---------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        17..22,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                17..22,
            ),
            op: Union,
            all: false,
            left: Select(
                SelectStmt {
                    span: Some(
                        0..16,
                    ),
                    hints: None,
                    distinct: false,
                    select_list: [
                        QualifiedName {
                            qualified: [
                                Star(
                                    Some(
                                        7..8,
                                    ),
                                ),
                            ],
                            exclude: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    from: [
                        Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..16,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "t1",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..16,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                    ],
                    selection: None,
                    group_by: None,
                    having: None,
                    window_list: None,
                },
            ),
            right: SetOperation(
                SetOperation {
                    span: Some(
                        40..49,
                    ),
                    op: Intersect,
                    all: false,
                    left: Select(
                        SelectStmt {
                            span: Some(
                                23..39,
                            ),
                            hints: None,
                            distinct: false,
                            select_list: [
                                QualifiedName {
                                    qualified: [
                                        Star(
                                            Some(
                                                30..31,
                                            ),
                                        ),
                                    ],
                                    exclude: None,
                                },
                            ],

                                Table {
                                    span: Some(
                                        37..39,

    span: Some(
        42..47,
    ),
    with: None,

        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                42..47,

            all: false,
            left: SetOperation(
                SetOperation {
                    span: Some(
                        18..23,
                    ),
                    op: Union,
                    all: false,
                    left: Select(
                        SelectStmt {
                            span: Some(
                                1..17,
                            ),
                            hints: None,
                            distinct: false,

                                    qualified: [

    span: Some(
        17..22,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: SetOperation(
        SetOperation {
            span: Some(
                17..22,
            ),
            op: Union,
            all: false,
            left: Select(
                SelectStmt {
                    span: Some(
                        0..16,
                    ),
                    hints: None,
                    distinct: false,
                    select_list: [
                        QualifiedName {
                            qualified: [
                                Star(
                                    Some(
                                        7..8,
                                    ),
                                ),
                            ],
                            exclude: None,
                        },

                        Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..16,

                                quote: None,

                    window_list: None,

---------- Input ----------

---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..48,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..48,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Subquery {
                    span: Some(
                        14..48,
                    ),
                    lateral: false,
                    subquery: Query {
                        span: Some(
                            26..32,
                        ),
                        with: None,
                        body: SetOperation(
                            SetOperation {
                                span: Some(
                                    26..32,
                                ),
                                op: Except,
                                all: false,

                                    SelectStmt {
                                        span: Some(
                                            16..24,
                                        ),
                                        hints: None,
                                        distinct: false,

                                                qualified: [
                                                    Star(
                                                        Some(
                                                            23..24,

                                                    ),
                                                ],
                                                exclude: None,
                                            },

                                            },

                                        window_list: None,
                                    },
                                ),
                            },

                        span: Some(
                            27..33,

                                span: Some(

    span: Some(
        0..54,
    ),
    with: None,

            span: Some(
                0..54,

                    qualified: [

                            Some(

                            ),

                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Subquery {
                    span: Some(
                        14..54,
                    ),
                    lateral: false,
                    subquery: Query {
                        span: Some(
                            15..32,
                        ),
                        with: None,
                        body: Select(
                            SelectStmt {
                                span: Some(
                                    15..32,

---------- Input ----------
select * from monthly_sales pivot(sum(amount) for month in ('JAN', 'FEB', 'MAR', 'APR')) order by empid
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM monthly_sales PIVOT(sum(amount) FOR month IN ('JAN', 'FEB', 'MAR', 'APR')) ORDER BY empid
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..88,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..88,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Table {
                    span: Some(
                        14..88,
                    ),
                    catalog: None,
                    database: None,
                    table: Identifier {
                        name: "monthly_sales",
                        quote: None,
                        span: Some(
                            14..27,
                        ),
                    },
                    alias: None,
                    travel_point: None,
                    pivot: Some(
                        Pivot {
                            aggregate: FunctionCall {
                                span: Some(
                                    34..45,
                                ),
                                distinct: false,
                                name: Identifier {
                                    name: "sum",
                                    quote: None,
                                    span: Some(
                                        34..37,
                                    ),
                                },
                                args: [
                                    ColumnRef {
                                        span: Some(
                                            38..44,
                                        ),
                                        database: None,
                                        table: None,
                                        column: Name(
                                            Identifier {
                                                name: "amount",
                                                quote: None,
                                                span: Some(
                                                    38..44,
                                                ),
                                            },
                                        ),
                                    },
                                ],
                                params: [],
                                window: None,
                                lambda: None,
                            },
                            value_column: Identifier {
                                name: "month",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    50..55,
                                ),
                            },
                            values: [
                                Literal {
                                    span: Some(
                                        60..65,
                                    ),
                                    lit: String(
                                        "JAN",
                                    ),
                                },
                                Literal {
                                    span: Some(
                                        67..72,
                                    ),
                                    lit: String(
                                        "FEB",
                                    ),
                                },
                                Literal {
                                    span: Some(
                                        74..79,
                                    ),
                                    lit: String(
                                        "MAR",
                                    ),
                                },
                                Literal {
                                    span: Some(
                                        81..86,
                                    ),
                                    lit: String(
                                        "APR",
                                    ),
                                },
                            ],
                        },
                    ),
                    unpivot: None,
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [
        OrderByExpr {
            expr: ColumnRef {
                span: Some(
                    98..103,
                ),
                database: None,
                table: None,
                column: Name(
                    Identifier {
                        name: "empid",
                        quote: None,
                        span: Some(
                            98..103,

                    },
                ),
            },
            asc: None,
            nulls_first: None,

}

    span: Some(

                            Some(

                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Table {
                    span: Some(
                        14..80,

                    database: None,

                        name: "monthly_sales_1",
                        quote: None,

                            14..29,

                    alias: None,
                    travel_point: None,

                        Unpivot {
                            value_column: Identifier {
                                name: "sales",
                                quote: None,

                    exclude: None,

            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,

    order_by: [],

    span: Some(
        0..74,
    ),
    with: None,

            span: Some(
                0..74,

            distinct: false,

                    expr: FunctionCall {

                        ),
                        distinct: false,
                        name: Identifier {
                            name: "sum",
                            quote: None,
                            span: Some(
                                7..10,
                            ),
                        },
                        args: [

                                span: Some(
                                    11..12,

                                        name: "w",

                            quote: None,

                            existing_window_name: None,

    span: Some(
        0..32,
    ),
    with: None,

        span: Some(
            0..32,
        ),

                    span: Some(
                        7..8,

                    lit: UInt64(
                        1,
                    ),

                    span: Some(
                        9..12,

                    lit: String(
                        "a",
                    ),
                },

                    span: Some(
                        15..16,

                        2,

                        "b",

                        23..27,

                        "c",

                span: Some(
                    42..46,

                        name: "col0",
                        quote: None,

                            42..46,

                    },

---------- Input ----------
select * from t left join lateral(select 1) on true, lateral(select 2)
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM t LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL (SELECT 1) ON TRUE, LATERAL (SELECT 2)
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..70,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..70,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Join {
                    span: Some(
                        16..25,
                    ),
                    join: Join {
                        op: LeftOuter,
                        condition: On(
                            Literal {
                                span: Some(
                                    47..51,
                                ),
                                lit: Boolean(
                                    true,
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                        left: Table {
                            span: Some(
                                14..15,
                            ),
                            catalog: None,
                            database: None,
                            table: Identifier {
                                name: "t",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    14..15,
                                ),
                            },
                            alias: None,
                            travel_point: None,
                            pivot: None,
                            unpivot: None,
                        },
                        right: Subquery {
                            span: Some(
                                26..43,
                            ),
                            lateral: true,
                            subquery: Query {
                                span: Some(
                                    34..42,
                                ),
                                with: None,
                                body: Select(
                                    SelectStmt {
                                        span: Some(
                                            34..42,
                                        ),
                                        hints: None,
                                        distinct: false,
                                        select_list: [
                                            AliasedExpr {
                                                expr: Literal {
                                                    span: Some(
                                                        41..42,
                                                    ),
                                                    lit: UInt64(
                                                        1,
                                                    ),
                                                },
                                                alias: None,
                                            },
                                        ],
                                        from: [],
                                        selection: None,
                                        group_by: None,
                                        having: None,
                                        window_list: None,
                                    },
                                ),
                                order_by: [],
                                limit: [],
                                offset: None,
                                ignore_result: false,
                            },
                            alias: None,
                        },
                    },
                },
                Subquery {
                    span: Some(
                        53..70,
                    ),
                    lateral: true,
                    subquery: Query {
                        span: Some(
                            61..69,
                        ),
                        with: None,
                        body: Select(
                            SelectStmt {
                                span: Some(
                                    61..69,
                                ),
                                hints: None,
                                distinct: false,
                                select_list: [
                                    AliasedExpr {
                                        expr: Literal {
                                            span: Some(
                                                68..69,
                                            ),
                                            lit: UInt64(
                                                2,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                        alias: None,
                                    },
                                ],
                                from: [],
                                selection: None,
                                group_by: None,
                                having: None,
                                window_list: None,
                            },
                        ),
                        order_by: [],
                        limit: [],
                        offset: None,
                        ignore_result: false,
                    },
                    alias: None,
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}


---------- Input ----------
select * from t, lateral flatten(input => u.col) f
---------- Output ---------
SELECT * FROM t, LATERAL flatten(input=>u.col) AS f
---------- AST ------------
Query {
    span: Some(
        0..50,
    ),
    with: None,
    body: Select(
        SelectStmt {
            span: Some(
                0..50,
            ),
            hints: None,
            distinct: false,
            select_list: [
                QualifiedName {
                    qualified: [
                        Star(
                            Some(
                                7..8,
                            ),
                        ),
                    ],
                    exclude: None,
                },
            ],
            from: [
                Table {
                    span: Some(
                        14..15,
                    ),
                    catalog: None,
                    database: None,
                    table: Identifier {
                        name: "t",
                        quote: None,
                        span: Some(
                            14..15,
                        ),
                    },
                    alias: None,
                    travel_point: None,
                    pivot: None,
                    unpivot: None,
                },
                TableFunction {
                    span: Some(
                        17..50,
                    ),
                    lateral: true,
                    name: Identifier {
                        name: "flatten",
                        quote: None,
                        span: Some(
                            25..32,
                        ),
                    },
                    params: [],
                    named_params: [
                        (
                            "input",
                            ColumnRef {
                                span: Some(
                                    42..47,
                                ),
                                database: None,
                                table: Some(
                                    Identifier {
                                        name: "u",
                                        quote: None,
                                        span: Some(
                                            42..43,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                ),
                                column: Name(
                                    Identifier {
                                        name: "col",
                                        quote: None,
                                        span: Some(
                                            44..47,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                    ],
                    alias: Some(
                        TableAlias {
                            name: Identifier {
                                name: "f",
                                quote: None,
                                span: Some(
                                    49..50,
                                ),
                            },
                            columns: [],
                        },
                    ),
                },
            ],
            selection: None,
            group_by: None,
            having: None,
            window_list: None,
        },
    ),
    order_by: [],
    limit: [],
    offset: None,
    ignore_result: false,
}
